name: João Meidanis
content: Joao Meidanis - Home Page Joao Meidanis Researcher and teacher at the Institute of Computing, UNICAMP. My main research interest is Computational Molecular Biology. I am part of the Computational Biology Group in my department. Since mid-1997, J. C. Setubal and myself have been involved in setting up and coordinating the LBI - Bioinformatics Laboratory, which serves several genome projects in Brazil. In 1999, João Paulo Kitajima has also joined us as coordinator of the lab. In 2002, I started Scylla, a bioiformatics company, with a group of colleagues from LBI. Press vehicles Pesquisa FAPESP and Folha de Sao Paulo noted the event. Scylla received an initial investment from Votorantim Ventures (later Votorantim New Business) and was located at the Softex business incubator. In 2004, Scylla completed its incubation process. In 2005, the company became profitable. Along our main bioinformatics product line, we now develop software for other scientific applications as well. Research & Publications Google Scholar Page Courses Quotes Here's how to get in touch with me: Email: meidanis at unicamp br Address: Joao Meidanis Institute of Computing UNICAMP Av. Albert Einstein, 1251 13083-852  Campinas,  Sao Paulo Brazil Phone number(s): +55 19 3521-5840 (New since 2023-08-20) Room 38 Last modified: Mon Mar 8 22:46:33 -03 2021 by JM
